news.title: Dogecoin Barks Up Another Record as Open Interest Tops $4 Billion
news.content: Traders continue to place their bets on Elon Musk's favorite coin: Dogecoin. Open interest for the asset surged to over $4 billion Saturday.

news.title: Why EV Stocks Lucid Motors, QuantumScape, and Navitas Semiconductor Rocketed Higher Today
news.content: Shares of electric vehicle ( EV ) and related stocks Lucid Motors ( NASDAQ: LCID ) , QuantumScape ( NYSE: QS ) , and Navitas Semiconductor Corporation ( NASDAQ: NVTS ) rallied today, up 3.3%, 3.7%, and 14.9%, respectively, in Monday's trading.The commonality among all three stocks is their ...

news.title: What's Going On With Tesla Stock Today? - Tesla  ( NASDAQ:TSLA )
news.content: Tesla Inc TSLA shares closed lower on Monday. Reports indicate Tesla vehicles would not be eligible for rebates under a new California consumer rebates proposal.

news.title: Rivian Stock Is Ripping Higher Monday: What's Driving The Action? - Rivian Automotive  ( NASDAQ:RIVN )
news.content: Rivian Automotive Inc RIVN shares are racing higher on Monday. The EV stock appears to be reacting to reports that Tesla Inc TSLA reached a "conditional" settlement with Rivian in regard to a 2020 lawsuit.

news.title: 5 Winning S&P 500 Stocks & Their ETFs Since Election
news.content: Since Trump's win, some S&P 500 stocks have gained more than 20% in the election. Investors can tap these high-momentum stocks in the ETF form.
